attributes.action: Remove the president of the eu commission Barosso, from making binding regulations on the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently the unelected president of the eu, barosso holds to much power over the elected heads of state, as was shown by the disgusting way in which he flew to Ireland to demand a second referrendum for the rejected lisbon/constitution treaty.  He should be removed from office, and banned from any further part in eu politics.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
